title: WTB:very low grade Old Judge Radbourn
author: piecesofthegame

posts.post_title: WTB:very low grade Old Judge Radbourn
posts.post_content: I've been retired from collecting for a couple years now but made the mistake of picking up the brand new book about Hoss Radbourn. Nothing like holding it in your hand, so I'm looking for a very low grade OJ Radbourn. It can be trimmmed or even skinned, just a decent image. You never know-if I get a good deal on a "fix" my addiction could return.
